subject: You Roughly Love Me
text:
You pull me down and roughly love me
 Then you quickly turn away
 Not a kind or tender word
 Do you ever have to say

 That's the way it's been for years now
 The same thing every night
 You take me then you leave me
 Just like turning out a light

 There's just one thing a missing
 In this love affair
 The feelings that I want and need
 The love we never share

 So keep this in your mind somewhere
 Someday it will surely be
 When I will give you back
 The love you have given me

 I'll pull you down and roughly love you
 And then I'll walk away
 Good - bye is the only word
 You will ever hear me say
